Reviews.Title: “Good place to stay”
Reviews.Author: BPisReady
Reviews.Content: stayed girlfriend week february first visit amsterdam girlfriend belongings stolen hotel first evening little apprehensive american quite grand hotel outside beautiful grand dining room room cant remember number 6th floor balcony adequate size usual facilities decent size bathroom note reviews luck quite clean able ask nonsmoking room didnt problems members safe room essential girlfriends previous experience free charge decor hallways room little dated side hotel lively area amsterdam didnt carry rooms plenty bars clubs coffee shops nearby short walk away hotel overlooks one canals dam square 25 minute walk away 5 mins trams stop rear hotel decent good value accomodation champagne breakfast must decide stay

Reviews.Title: “Location, location, location!”
Reviews.Author: lauriebeth1121
Reviews.Content: recently stayed room perfectly located hotel room nice balcony overlooking canal decent size found staff encountered friendly professional would definitly stay property highly recommend amsterdam american hotel

Reviews.Title: “First class”
Reviews.Author: Gerry_Coe
Reviews.Content: group four us stayed amsterdam american february 2006 booked two rooms new square hotel building wasnt completed time upgraded amsterdam american seen hotels website excited looking forward staying upon arrival grand lobby restaurant however change arrived rooms firstly check long process although staff quite pleasant seemed take forever well credit card details gave reception security later used guarantee member hotel staff however time used credit card months left lobby got lift like stepped back time marble floors changed 60s style carpet spacious foyer maze dingy corridors hotel room served purpose tiny especially bathroom virtually impossible close door loo without taking legs one evenings long days sightseeing eaten way back hotel decided coffees dessert hotel restaurant served man found wanted looked us horns wasnt friendly stayed amsterdam aware 5 hotels wouldnt would class 5 however would say 2 hotel granted location ok year stayed die van cleve hotel beside dam square much satisfied thought location much better said get really cheap deal stay go dont fooled paying stay thinking rooms service superior many cheaper hotels found amsterdam

Reviews.Title: “Excellent all round”
Reviews.Author: CarolineBlyth
Reviews.Content: hotel definitely well located fun museums shopping stayed top floor good sized room tiny bathroom cafe breakfast great setting room service breakfasts enough 2

Reviews.Title: “Very clean, friendly staff, excellent location!”
Reviews.Author: chaos1785
Reviews.Content: returned weeks stay american hotel caught bus outside main entrance airport good option euros dropped 25 yards hotel impressed art facade hotel entered find modern reception area staff friendly helpful checked immediately room okay 3 5 little disappointing already seen hotel balcony overlooking canal side hotel exceptionally quiet thru night tip room believe 6 rooms side rooms may want request one room king size bed nice flat screen tv mini bar 2 desk area chair bathroom fine little small side housekeeping fairly good although forget supply us towels one day quick call reception fixed problem bar restaurant good although would nice open later 1 whole would say enjoyed stay get 14 day advance booking room good value

Reviews.Title: “A good base in Paris.”
Reviews.Author: RuswarpBoy
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights location great positive hotel expensive 5 star worth price staff front desk rude charged us extra 3 people room instead 2 room tiny nothing like advertised view alley stayed marriott also across canal much larger room much less expensive staff nicer also

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel in an excellent place”
Reviews.Author: ElijaYJ
Reviews.Content: wife stayed hotel easter weekend great stay 6th floor quit room housekeeping always good job making room front desk staff always nice us us said would stay

Reviews.Title: “How Could We have missed it Before”
Reviews.Author: littlejohn46
Reviews.Content: stayed american hotel start april 2006 never go back hotel advertised five star would give one star get room first floor room smelt damp rubbish bed decor badly need complete ceiling floor complaining got moved two star room going back amsterdam hotel

Reviews.Title: “great location, great breakfast, clean”
Reviews.Author: stefan50
Reviews.Content: organised stag party stay amsterdam american really looked us group 22 irish wild stag party often put fear god hotel staff welcomed friendly staff treated without exception rooms clean little small enough us smaller bar left reception excellent patrons visitors barman great hotel caters types visitor fair would definately recommend staying hotel whether large group couples might even take back stays

Reviews.Title: “Best coffee I had in Paris”
Reviews.Author: randomly_chaotic
Reviews.Content: husband stayed hotel 2 nights december room good size clean small balcony bed soft bit like sleeping water bed problem hotels computer system apparently broken receptionist wasnt able give us final bill checked bill arrived post almost 2 months later included 22 euro charge using internet neither us used internet didnt even laptop us watch charges

Reviews.Title: “Amazing location, best you'll get for the price.”
Reviews.Author: Hannah G
Reviews.Content: hotel great location large room balcony 80 euros per deal staff came contact friendly helpful would definately stay noted american woman hotel manager sunday february woman telephone charges made 10 minute call room rate euros per minute thats right euros per minute hotel manager although polite simply told went back room information rates use phone partner well traveled know one never use hotel room phone calls especially foreign come euros minute wouldnt heard stay away phone

Reviews.Title: “Good 3 star hotel in the center”
Reviews.Author: AlessandroF
Reviews.Content: wife went amsterdam 2 friends friday 17 feb till sunday 19th found hotel wanted friendly staff good rooms soft beds hot water fill large bath tub location good use tram 1 2 5 11 central station sauna good breakfast high side â‚¬20 plenty hand dinner american restaurant spot nicely presented food surroundings sum great cost staff wanted help

Reviews.Title: “Would Stay Again”
Reviews.Author: maureenmmg
Reviews.Content: although agree design important extremely pleased hotel location perfect daytime shopping 2030 minute walk max anything much closer good sheets comfy pillows big flat screen tvs closed camera fixed leidseplein absolutely even stopping highly recommended especially get discount rate got 110

Reviews.Title: “Great choice in Paris”
Reviews.Author: Tigerbeth
Reviews.Content: staying dam sq spent 2 nights american hotel got spacious canal view really liked room bathroom small modern clean breakfast really excellent price checkout noticed charged 60 eu telephone calls used card wich supposed free connection receptionist said smile charge every connection 2 eu pay every number rather disappointing thing trip stayed 2 hotels never heard connection charge last evening asked book airport shuttle seats us morning breakfast bus left 10 minutes earlier without us wait 20 minutes 5 stars hotel would recommend hotel like location nice canal views

Reviews.Title: “Would stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: samanthafi
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2 nights christmas must bit recent reviews hotel however got staff extremely helpful problems checking early slight musty smell step lift room modern great view spotless plasma tv hotel within easy reach major bars restaurants tram routes sports bar across road brilliant breakfast enjoy museums take boat trip located outside hotel waste 2 hours pleased service got would definitely stay hotel ps believe word concierge seems like everything get tourist information road

Reviews.Title: “5 Star Service”
Reviews.Author: Robin B
Reviews.Content: bit hotel recent reviews loved total 4 nights stayed two went london two nights returned two nights kind even put us room without asking thought room big comfortable decor nice bathroom huge big soaking bed also big two smaller beds put together really liked location hotel tons restaurants pubs choose looking stay near red light district bit far probably 2030 minute walk fine actually enjoyed walking city center van gogh museum 5 minute walk didnt get chance eat american cafe beautiful ate pancake bakery one day visiting anne frank museum delicious dont order plain pancake many better choices dont shocked typical pancakes americans used youre looking canal tour dont night one almost half people boat passed boring romantic theres lots see day plus half price time would suggest taking day trip one beach cities sea food going see

Reviews.Title: “Great location and dependable.”
Reviews.Author: Steve C
Reviews.Content: stayed two nights hotel last weekend room ok comfortable beds bit noisy building works across road limited tea coffee provided room two would nice call room service bath towels face tried champagne breakfast second day alternative good value pancake house across road provided considering costs euro top fairly high room charge value money came 930am hot items gone cold stayed days inns usa third price including basic breakfast better standard rooms time european hotels stopped customers

Reviews.Title: “Gen in the heart of Paris”
Reviews.Author: David P
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights repeat trip city would tough find better location like buzz nightlife art museums thoroughly disappointed room size small college room service completely average one went way positive reviews site made book first place average mostly location wow expected reading sites reviews paying amount felt

Reviews.Title: “Central location”
Reviews.Author: morrisjanita
Reviews.Content: wonderful hotel room spacious clean staff helpful friendly cafe bar give hotel great atmosphere location good plenty good restaurants tram stop canal cruise close

Reviews.Title: “Will not stay here again”
Reviews.Author: k99js06
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel last week august booked hotel net bit however could happier location hotel excellent near bars restaurants shops park hotel fantastic rooms great comfy beds ideal bathroom course minibar restaurant bar food great bar also extensive cocktail list breakfast occasion missed everything could possibly want nothing like champagne start day stayed amsterdam five times first time hotel one thing sure wont last cant wait return many thanks cheerful friendly staff

Reviews.Title: “Very comfortable and cozy”
Reviews.Author: golden2002
Reviews.Content: 4 hotels stayed favorite hotels equal quality unique annoying others none ruined trip hotel experience best thing hotel others location leidesplein greatest location possible like every hotel staff helpful hotel american definately feel return amsterdam hotel top list

Reviews.Title: “Well located & great staff!”
Reviews.Author: Caetas
Reviews.Content: partner recently visited wonderful hotel four night break amsterdam art loved art details present soon walked deluxe room lovely spacious art cons present great coffee machine fully stocked mini bar great jet shower puts home shame canal views lovely location hotel perfect stones throw great bars restaurants towns shops first night ate hotel restaurant gorgeous beautiful food surroundings soft live music playing background best yet come often went drinks hotels cafe american great art deco bar reputation rock star indeed walls lined famous stars bar fact saw first night first confirmed next night one bar staff really friendly bar staff made us feel welcome even remembered favourite drinks came back relaxed vibe great place eat whether big meal snacks staff welcoming helpful definitely somewhere pay another visit

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location”
Reviews.Author: clairess_11
Reviews.Content: husband daughter stayed june 17 2005 glad chose hotel arrived early morning room available yet luggage stored us shown cafe room requested nonsmoking room balcony given also overlooked lovely canal bed large comfortable three us able share bed wonderful nights sleep bathroom nice size clean good shower room large also clean liked way room furnished favorite part hotel cafe room rate included breakfast served beautiful place eat enjoy wonderful array food drink including champagne coffee honestly best ever tasted enjoyed atmosphere much decided dinner well tried two dishes delightful service efficient helpful asked waiter question architecture hotel gave large packet information hotel history asked available hotel front desk found beautiful one done concierge always available ready luggage cab time check location hotel could better situated fun area city also quiet night within walking distance everything

Reviews.Title: “Small size, large service”
Reviews.Author: mh999
Reviews.Content: checked american terrible experience hotel barman bar terrible hotel showed us reception explained dutch happened receptionist offered us discounted room per night although expensive well worth every penny room fantastic bed size football staff friendly welcoming reception concierge delightful sauna excellent excellent room service every room everything could forgotten adapter one sent minutes restaurant elegant although little pricey worth breakfast least choice food bar friendly serves excellent long island tea would hesitate stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice...but very, very small room.”
Reviews.Author: IndianaAnn
Reviews.Content: one best hotels ive stayed moment arrived staff friendly speaking good english let us check early 1030 useful rooms larger expected clean well presented point two night stay eat hotel drinks bar amazing sit bar look visited hotel finally location outstanding one main 10 mins walk central station would recommend everyone

Reviews.Title: “Central but small”
Reviews.Author: TyronS
Reviews.Content: stayed weekend xmas 3 nights arrived booked early cheap flight easyjet werent meant checking reception made us welcome showed us room chill room ready dropped luggage walk around amsterdam wow beautiful city anyway returned back hotel shown room firstly smelt smoke secondly view awful asked reception anything could girlfriends 30th hence trip made sure reception knew gave one nicest rooms hotel extra charge beautiful view overlooking canal staff extremely helpful didnt eat restaurant looked expensive like eat town though coffee nice morning also cocktail bar nice place start evening basically hotel art deco rooms bit obviously beautiful rooms would recommend anyone stay always make sure ask change rooms never know whats available long polite im amazed many people website write review hotel room never actually asked move rooms dont ask dont get hotel assume everyone happy unless told otherwise hope find review helpful

Reviews.Title: “Worth the Price - will be back”
Reviews.Author: BSanders_11
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel new year although rooms decor appropriate 5 star hotel service poor generally also turn air conditioning rooms winter room gets warm window service restuarant bar took business elsewhere frequent visitor amsterdam one disappointing hotels stayed would return uk

Reviews.Title: “We had two rooms for 4 of us. Great Location”
Reviews.Author: kd1315
Reviews.Content: spent 4 nights crowne plaza american would recommend best thing hotel location leidseplein 10 minutes walk museumplein reading reviews seems room types vary greatly standard room spacious amsterdam standards ive stayed number hotels city well overlooked canal breakfast excellent cheaper book bb rather pay day staff general pleasant helpful didnt specific requests imagine would dealt promptly bar okay theres much nicer bars sit watch world go fine drink heading one word warning bar appears evening bar quiet staff aware make move remove didnt bother might bother people

Reviews.Title: “Friendly staff, wonderful stay”
Reviews.Author: Kangarian
Reviews.Content: stayed american 3 nights august bank holiday year booked direct hotel best rate chose superior room checkin fine got drink voucher chocolates priority club members room however disappointing requested canal view read reviews square noisy didnt get either got room two small windows opened onto small gap bit hotel bit could look directly peoples rooms could see us windows quite small next door close didnt get much natural light room felt bit dingy superior room thought bit small right end corridor furnishings nice bed comfy everything nice clean though bathroom didnt window hoped would exterior wall ok sized definitely superior fair didnt complain didnt asked moved knew wouldnt spending much time room maybe could moved rooms aside hotel nice walk attractions 20 mins away walk pleasant theres much see trams stop outside easy get around breakfast think massive buffet theres even champagne included would reccommend hotel would stay would ask moved got sort room wasnt worth money

Reviews.Title: “We like it”
Reviews.Author: Célia S
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights crown plaza american loved location best ams staff room large european hotel upgraded room private balcony overlooking city everything ams 10 minute walk hotel breakfast buffet steep tons options visited pleased crown plaza

Reviews.Title: “Location, Location, Location”
Reviews.Author: DinaS61
Reviews.Content: wife stayed august bank holiday weekend 4 nights city great definately buy amsterdam pass great value hotel hand quite expectations double superior room facing theatre read previous reviews say could noisy find disturbing room small clean unfortunately hotel full room change double duvet 2 singles one pillow request 2 lifts slow remember listed building enjoy breakfast slightly expensive great surroundings need eat dinner food excellent breakfast dinner customer service side better day shift whereas night shift slightly think mainly american japanese guests get relaxed atmosphere approach restaurant staff service dont eat want quick bite restaurant staff always attentive couldnt enough asset try bar cocktails average prices never know rich american may buy drink yes someone bought round whole bar generous sum amsterdam great city think better value elsewhere

Reviews.Title: “Gem of a hotel in a perfect location”
Reviews.Author: mbudensiek
Reviews.Content: taken advice good friend checked tripadvisor hotel booked read reviews promptly cancelled booking using tripadvisor guide thank took partner amsterdam 40th birthday crowne plaza excellent location room clean modern per hotel website staff helpful especially requested room change one cancel view however view lovely room spacious furniture wasnt modern changed back original room quiet lovely fuss lovely girl reception breakfast lovely lots eat amazed since europe get continental breakfast partner really enjoyed stay cant comment dinner reading menu price seem expensive would recommend hotel would state read everything rooms items mini bar since charged directly made mistake quickly rectified reception fuss

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel in an Incredible Location!!”
Reviews.Author: Carma73
Reviews.Content: wife stayed hotel two nights august 2004 enjoyed stay location excellent room good balcony facing canal breakfast buffet superb would recommend hotel friends said minor problems worth mentioning 1 arrived room ready yet checkin 2 next day went hotel came back rest period sufficient hotel clean room 3 elevators slow got stuck inside twice within two days short period scary feeling

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely delightful - will definitely be back.”
Reviews.Author: montypython51
Reviews.Content: near quiet area 3star hotel nice residential area walking distance building sometimes feeling might clean actually old need elevator small old single room tiny bargain eur 40 weekend

Reviews.Title: “Great Paris location”
Reviews.Author: Kittenkeeper
Reviews.Content: full

Reviews.Title: “I stayed there in January 2011 with my daughter. I then returned in May 2011 due to the great experience with my wife.”
Reviews.Author: VENDOME79
Reviews.Content: full

Reviews.Title: “Perfect!”
Reviews.Author: jlac762
Reviews.Content: nice hotel 2 blocks away tuileries metro station 1 block rue di rivoli short walk seine louvre tuileries gardens place vendome shops restaurants etc hotel clean staff spoke english helpful breakfast good hot foods cold single room small side every priced hotel paris small side quiet room deluxe rooms bigger see inside one theres good irish pub right next door

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location”
Reviews.Author: Emmamty
Reviews.Content: location hotel perfect us 15 minute walk train station 5 minute walk subway system could walk attractions 15 20 minutes room comfortable convenient pub located block location quality room made fact cost per night place stayed europe

Reviews.Title: “A nice stay”
Reviews.Author: Bindy76
Reviews.Content: seven friends stayed duminy vendome st night 17th march 21st stay really great group 8 male twin beds rooms good kept clean good order hotel staff excellent friendly luckily us spoke good english hotel excellent location took train airport one change got metro station hotel 4 minute walk away breakfast really great plenty choice including sausages scrambled eggs fresh fruit cereals yogurt plenty bread etc ate well meant needed light snack keep us going evening time great irish pub next door handy much needed ireland central paris taste runs expensive designer wear round corner would definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Excellent service”
Reviews.Author: rmc103
Reviews.Content: great hotel really welcoming helpful queries room perfectly comfortable appropriate great shower breakfast pleasure catered european perfect base exploring wonderful things paris offer jardin de 2 minute walk staff whether ordering taxi venue bus airport would certainly stay next visit

Reviews.Title: “Unbeatable location, spotlessly clean, fabulous hotel.”
Reviews.Author: stpauligirlmn
Reviews.Content: excellent hotel great location couldnt fault anything stay hotel room comfortable spacious clean great choice foods available breakfast perfect walking many tourist attractions well metro lines restaurants cafes

Reviews.Title: “Exceded Expectations, Very clean and Helpful and Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: devonpearman
Reviews.Content: super location walking city metro rue de rivoli staff excellent right amount friendliness professionalism ok bedrooms small perfectly adequate clean right facilities good free wifi breakfast room relaxing good buffet hot choices would welcome staff breakfast excellent absolutely hesitation recommending hotel good base centre paris

Reviews.Title: “Perfect”
Reviews.Author: Natian08
Reviews.Content: hotel ok location really great place quiet standard double room size ok problem could easily hear neighbors breakfast great previous traveler said staff great helpful weather cold air condition 24 degrees without problem noise return

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel”
Reviews.Author: CaroleNye Posted by an OctopusTravel traveler
Reviews.Content: travel paris every february 12th year stayed 4 star hotels match duminy want bar gym friendly hotel guest welcome duminy found could expected wonderful large room albeit bathroom twin sinks allowed toast breads breakfast array cereals fruits eggs anything weather might throw fine cold gone nonetheless addition room extra radiator heater thank staff professional attention people complain elevators french hotel small dont understand history elevators buildings get used part problem credit card company staff us helped could end perfect holiday looking elsewhere next year return long duminy us year year latin least hotels

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful staff - helpful and friendly.”
Reviews.Author: Miss001
Reviews.Content: elevator room compact service cleanliness location breakfast superb great place stay near louvre place vendome without bank

Reviews.Title: “Far beyond our expectations... !”
Reviews.Author: kiwirunner10
Reviews.Content: hotel perfectly located right near metro station short walk les transfers rer used metro much hotel great location attractions foot hotel clean well presented staff friendly helpful front desk helpful stay cannot recommend services highly enough breakfast cellar best continental breakfast ive pastries cereals fruits yoghurts meats eggs sausages juices good coffee served breakfast best paris id stay make sure get decent cup coffee stay

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel - perfect location and helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: v8disco
Reviews.Content: great hotel fantastic location paris right opposite tuileries louvre genuinely dont think youd get better location price amazing breakfast make sure rolls lunch good size room decent ensuite clean hotel friendly staff best hotel ive stayed paris value would say probably 4 definitely anyway think may somehow ended room though tip make sure book hotels website realised slightly travel websites

Reviews.Title: “Super Hotel, Great Location, Magical City”
Reviews.Author: themozzer
Reviews.Content: stayed one night hotel great location common parts breakfast room shame rather old bedroom least clean

Reviews.Title: “I liked it a lot.”
Reviews.Author: itsmej
Reviews.Content: hotel great location staff good well priced hotel expensive neighborhood great location walls biggest drawback spotless

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding service with a great location to all you need to see in Paris!”
Reviews.Author: westfield002
Reviews.Content: first time visitors paris glad chose hotel got great location helpful staff rooms small side expected europe able walk lot attractions far ritz shops paris loved every minute stay

Reviews.Title: “Great Location , Nice Staff , Good Breaksfast , Sleep Well and Clean!!”
Reviews.Author: armam
Reviews.Content: stayed long weekend january room face road quiet room small functional clean updated beds comfortable breakfast delicious served eggs sausage various breads cereals yogurt pastries cheeses juice 510 min walk louvre musee dorsay min walk eiffel tower notre dame picturesque neighborhood around corner excellent service would stay

Reviews.Title: “Excelent location! Very confortable room.”
Reviews.Author: AleDeri
Reviews.Content: booked 2 rooms january 2012 hotel immaculately clean breakfast good staff superb handicapped use front desk staff went way make sure comfortable spacious room could easily get around first floor hotel

Reviews.Content: going book hotel recommendation travel agent ready make reservation price almost 400 us looked making reservation used link tripadvisor free breakfast offer free less regular room breakfast rate one would better special offer advance purchase tripadvisor free breakfast sounds like

Reviews.Content: travel agent recommended place reading reviews trip advisor booked hotel location best thing hotel within 5 minute walk louvre eiffel tower champs elysees reached walking though take 30 minutes rooms small clean comfortable like lifts would best request room lower floor think 6 levels lifts tiny stairs steep 18 steps floors breakfast nice usual offerings including noise though coming pub next door didnt affect boys could hear noise till 3am 3 star establishment good

Reviews.Content: start positive things hotel husband stayed four nights paris conference husband attending 1 clean always goes long way book hotel isnt clean nothing else even worth considering common spaces room clean mattress sheets clean etc 2 staff nice spoke english well friendly pleasant tried helpful 3 location great youre within walking distance tourist shopping highlights paris neighborhood safe walkable central 4 breakfast room neat food decent lead decision never stay hotel 1 noise hands hotel ever stayed stay stay rooms ending 08 avoid 08 room room despite upgraded room wall service staff use laundry wooden door time anyone went staircase used floor heard room despite complaints front desk would change room anything staff using staircase laundry sleeping hours heavy sleeper even woke time time windows also need updating heard onto street bar across street wee hours morning acceptable stumbled around paris next sleep place loud 2 bathroom bathroom needs updated tub still lacks shower shower head hold shower whole time take bath know showers less common europe us acceptable hotel expensive also hair dryer mounted wall welcome horribly outdated required hold button entire time keep small detail unless long thick hair like need dry every morning winter quickly becomes hair fun finally shampoo conditioner hotel issue shampoo turned hair 3 staff made us restaurant reservation upon request via email trip told us wrong time showed restaurant final night paris restaurant different time hotel gave us reservation eating restaurant disappointing 4 room amenities soso cable tv three english stations news stations big deal certainly average housekeeping staff replace water minibar day annoying 5 free wifi difficult log also pay options faster password changed often staff personally deliver password room bit odd whole nothing many options central paris price point going hotel still catching lost sleep due extreme

Reviews.Title: “A hidden gem in a great location!”
Reviews.Author: frmalarky
Reviews.Content: small well located near louvre great shopping rooms small comfortable air conditioning turned summer opened windows night big mistake three locals bars nearby noise loud wee hours trash pickup every morning 600 wonderful restaurants within two blocks shopping nearby terrific easy get taxi guest services excellent breakfast downstairs every morning fantastic concierge terrific also nice boutique hotel

Reviews.Title: “Exactly What We Expected”
Reviews.Author: Brock9
Reviews.Content: wife spent close 2 weeks paris earlier year duminy vendome provided perfect location travel splendid city within walking distance virtually prime paris tourist location including champs elysees du louvre eiffel tower also close shops including galleries several easily located places enjoy meal room decent size clean amenities large bathroom hotel undergoing renovations loud day ok spent day outdoors would trip breakfast included included cereals breads hot food highly recommend stay return one favourite destinations world

Reviews.Title: “Great Location and good value for Paris”
Reviews.Author: LuckyCountry15
Reviews.Content: many said rooms small compared international style hotels old building heart paris dont expect vast suites lacking room size certainly made location walk anywhere 4 minutes louvre place place de concorde 1 minute rue de rivoli many restaurants bars bakeries within couple minutes walk like comfortable hotel end day staying paris visit paris stay hotel hotel perfect exploring paris

Reviews.Title: “Adequate accommodations, good location”
Reviews.Author: TrekRef
Reviews.Content: wonderfully convenient boutique hotel clean nice front desk staff easy get metro wonderful cafes shops nearby walking distance many museums sights tea kettle treats room perfect comfortable bed linens going lobby certainly book hotel going back paris thanks great stay

Reviews.Title: “Great location - especially if travelling with toddlers.”
Reviews.Author: TheDinas
Reviews.Content: first staff us directions suggestions location fabulous walked almost everywhere louvre walking distance also walked seine elevators tiny well knew going europe expect smaller rooms however smallest far room europe checked map rooms door appeared staying smallest floor room nice view great looked narrow street lovely hotels many flower boxes windows bathroom nice breakfast neat experience lower level food sufficient comparable holiday express loved location would definitely stay knew would larger room

Reviews.Title: “Dreaming of going back....”
Reviews.Author: elpidoushka
Reviews.Content: part group three couples stayed august 2011 convenient quaint spotless place stay breakfast included superb stay highly recommended others well done

Reviews.Title: “Great location but dont take room on ground floor”
Reviews.Author: southlanarksire
Reviews.Content: really enjoyed stay room large bed clean lot walking space around bed bathroom spacious also clean nice breakfast offered room rate one small issue elevator tiny could barely accommodate two normal sized adults actually make multiple trips get bags upstairs staff friendly english speaking helpful hotel bar pretty often empty overall nice stay hotel come back

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Great Staff.”
Reviews.Author: sleepingbeauty_10
Reviews.Content: hotel faulted hotels stayed world trip hotel areas would love go back paris fantastic location service thanks

Reviews.Title: “I wouldn't stay it if I were you!!”

Reviews.Content: researching hotels paris given number stayed various paris hotels years mixed experiences know worth taking time research paris hotels never quite seem match rates quality perhaps true much visited capital city however hotel pretty close rooms fairly basic room wasnt decorated pictures clean comfortable room standard central location often trade location excellent 2 minutes tuileries metro station rue du rivoli yet tucked away arrived late around midnight checked welcomed efficiently also asked everything ok stay check nice touch dont always get hotels seem customers tell tripadvisor instead breakfast served stylish cellar room see pictures excellent buffet choice waitress forgot drinks order second day irritating keen get minor complaint overall enjoyable stay

Reviews.Author: Mainiac_in_York
Reviews.Content: husband stayed couple establishments time paris unfortunately duminy vendome wasnt favourite nice enough given rate paid know could done better establishments stayed similar rate however properties far nicer feeling 45 star 3 star duminy location location great terms major attractions eg notre dame louvre shopping champs 5 minutes stroll depending tourists could extend 10 mins quite know end day miles walking minutes stroll back hotel additionally cafes shopping around cafes located along nearby mostly frequented tourists husband preferred venture streets cafes mostly smaller local feel hotel property located older building however despite age property felt lacked style flair bland atmosphere rooms clean hotel ie foyer breakfast room however constant hotels age dont usually signs however couldnt miss old peeling wallpaper musty rooms hallway renovations currently taking place looks big wouldnt stay reason alone although cleanliness priority definitely met prefer establishment taste tired old hotel staff read reviews staff friendly prompt email received prior visit arrival promptly upgrade room space reasons request promptly accommodated happy spacious privilege room generally staff pleasant offered help however disappointing note reception staff frequently air used staff offering least friendly hello presence guests without case felt staff didnt guests unless also thought somewhat unprofessional see 3 staff smoking immediately outside establishment must break would thought area without guests guess space premium breakfast nice enough overly fussy guess natural compared properties stayed paris stay usually love holiday including every morning instance didnt bother much croissants pastries werent different supermarket baked variety back home staff pleasant quickly accommodated requests although location hit mark property including staff showed complete style flair basis wouldnt stay paid 200 euro per night room kingsize bed spacious tired

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel and friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: MGT302
Reviews.Content: wonderful hotel great location staff helpful room small clean comfortable 5 minute walk metro station walking distance notre dame louvre breakfast think old cellar great room breakfast also great irish pub next door handy cold beer long day sight recomend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great location and breakfast”
Reviews.Author: Minilr
Reviews.Content: position hotel amazing walking distance louvre champs elysees central city well lots cafes restaurants staff extremely helpful

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Brilliant”
Reviews.Author: Denalan
Reviews.Content: location location great super want near everything want live 1 perfect hotel almost live street stores like etc etc cant ask better location live minutes away almost anything beautiful course hotel hotel great well price happy many hotels great location well nice inside hotel great room super tiny everything felt nice clean breakfast good staff helpful minus us must size tiny room small elevator common paris didnt bother us much conclusion super location want stay 1 great hotel price pay helpful staff clean nice would love come back

Reviews.Title: “what out for the pub next door”
Reviews.Author: Lambiri
Reviews.Content: duminy amazing location 1 min back famous rue de rivoli therefore louvre gardens place de la concorde musee dorsay seine place vendome opera best kept secret paris charming little hotel tucked away quiet location close famous sites paris clean comfortable staff friendly helpful bonus paris breakfast lovely many famous parisian treats 3 hotel 5 many famous hotels neighbours ritz etc course dont forget famous cafe around corner rue de rivoli best hot chocolate paris check cakes youre recommended 2 friends stayed much enjoyed wonderful little one stayed 2 weeks upgraded best room well certainly back duminy every time travel paris

Reviews.Title: “Not bad, but not such a great value”
Reviews.Author: bauwens
Reviews.Content: small friendly hotel perfect location weekend paris location fantastic couple minutes louvre hotel staff friendly helpful recommended great restaurant round corner breakfast lovely interesting cellar room good choice really great hotel perfect three girls would recommend hotel hope back

Reviews.Title: “Spotless clean with great staff!!!”
Reviews.Author: Barbarka
Reviews.Content: group 10 stayed celebrate year 40th hotel website service location sound rooms cozy bar air conditioning good thing location smack bang middle paris good access metro ends air con walls thin bar refurbished closed unless drink lobby complained departure receptionist shoulders picked phone ignored hoping id go away bathroom dirty room small could fit one bag paid 200 euros per night hoping wed able good room good location cozy bar meet sadly disappointed well never go back receptionist

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: stanmarr
Reviews.Content: staying ritz sunday evening wanted somewhere book saturday night extra night looking hotel close less expensive found duminy vendome sounded ideal well priced 3 star hotel arrival room ready although small clean nicely furnished facilities needed including coffee making facilities room service fast priced tasty arrived late breakfast 10 minutes due although finished still given table served breakfast without rushed although short stay would highly recommend would stay uk

Reviews.Title: “Bad Value”
Reviews.Author: StarNvigator
Reviews.Content: first stay us paris lovely staff pleasant spoke good english room lovely bed divine get buffet breakfast yum

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel just two blocks away from the Ritz”
Reviews.Author: Daniel025
Reviews.Content: husband stayed 3 nights location superb us close metro nice walk number major sights staff pleasant breakfast wonderful room quiet whilst know common paris hotels found room tiny

Reviews.Title: “Location is everything.”
Reviews.Author: Mr_Nomad
Reviews.Content: unfortunately duminy surrounded 5 star hotels doormen valets however fantastic location rue de rivoli near louvre near boutique shopping st service excellent staff happy speak english us often case breakfast great warning travelling lot suitcases lift tiny room good quiet despite next lift irish pub really impressed realised washing missing arrived uk found posted brilliant thing bad location hard find good eating places tourist

Reviews.Title: “Perfectly Located & Great Value........Will definately stay there again!!!”
Reviews.Author: Jared&Rachel
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel split days sunday monday checked back thursday friday small comfortable clean wonderful little hotel triple room much bigger expected full sized bath tub shower room bath spotless beds warm comfortable staff friendly extremely helpful stayed room rooms room overly large plenty big enough three adults third bed real bed cot room next door door open cleaned maid tiny room one double bed end bed 2 feet door 2 feet wall side even though small also looked cozy spotless would perfectly adequate couple elevators tiny barely fit three people two luggage location across street jardin louvre block place du steps several wonderful cafes close transit walking distance ready good stroll walking distance sights including notre dame saint dorsay location superb paris centrally located staff hotel amazing person friendly welcoming helpful polite recommended couple eating spots gave directions called taxi get us back airport advised reserve taxi ahead time pay extra 9 euro charge enough try getting back charles de gaulle train afraid get lost miss flight silly hotel walk rer would gotten us directly cdg distance far enough one rolling suitcase difficult walk highly recommend wonderful little hotel made stay paris exceptional

Reviews.Title: “Excellent central location!!”
Reviews.Author: sima1
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights birthday treat daughter friend duminy vendome best hotel stayed paris amazing location shopping sightseeing staff fantastic especially front desk nothing much trouble booked restaurants cabs recommended ways sights brought us drinks little bar rooms spotless good bathrooms fairly quiet although next time would book one right lift little noisy first thing morning beds really comfy top quality pillows return

Reviews.Title: “Coupe Du Mond Rugby 2007”
Reviews.Author: SWARBRS
Reviews.Content: stayed baby extended staff absolutely fantastic couldnt enough reception breakfast room good size needed including baby location couldnt louvre 5 min elysee arc de 10 eiffel tower 15 min near centre great variety restaurants nearby irish bar next man working breakfast brilliant always remembered coffee order without chance thank last would definitely recommend stay

Reviews.Title: “From Sydney with Love”
Reviews.Author: daccordfrenchies
Reviews.Content: best hotel paris stayed heart city close centre town room spacious nicely decorated bathroom also really fantastic bed comfortable teacoffee maker flat screen tv hairdryer safe etc staff friendly helpful lovely bar night cap would hesitation recommending hotel definitely stay next time paris

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: holidayauckland
Reviews.Content: travelling broken leg staff hotel really helpful wheelchair hire etc visit arrived given room second floor wallpaper coming walls corridor looked bit shabby signs saying refurbished room fine clean tidy tea making facilities tv shower bath wardrobe hairdryer comfy bed spent one night small made almost impossible get bathroom wardrobe asked chance getting bigger room receptionist spoke manager moved us larger room ground floor perfect could even fit wheelchair staff amazing really friendly eager help queries booked taxis made dinner reservations gave good advice excursions breakfast great get selection go breakfast room good option room service fancy nice bar area shared areas clean decorated tidy location perfect sightseeing within short stroll louvre champs elysees place vendome concorde lots nice restaurants would recommend hotel anyone looking somewhere stay paris

Reviews.Title: “Paris in the summer at the Place Vendome”
Reviews.Author: Nabby1973
Reviews.Content: charming small hotel pleasant surprise us even better photos previous reviews spotlessly clean wonderful comfy beds white linen tastefully decorated rooms excellent staff service delicious buffet breakfast located smart sophisticated location close many good restaurants world class boutique shopping landmark attractions le louvre highly recommend duminy vendome australia

Reviews.Title: “lovely hotel in the City of Lights”
Reviews.Author: nikki70
Reviews.Content: booked hotel purely based tripadvisor reviews every bit good reviews led believe location perfect quiet street short walk louvre one way place de la concorde champs elysee eiffel tower also easy walking distance room excellent room idea standard rooms like room clean quiet large bathroom breakfast room basement beautifully presented breakfasts also excellent staff met friendly helpful spoke excellent english next door really good irish bar spent little time local good city centre prices exception japanese small packed friendly served excellent food reasonably priced excellent choice would going back found cheapest would recommend hotel booking

Reviews.Title: “Stay next a $1200 a night hotel for 1/5 of the price!!!!”
Reviews.Author: jbohun
Reviews.Content: wife great pleasure staying hotel dec 2010 30th dec 2010 privilege triple room including breakfast hotel better hoped ideal location walking shopping areas going notre dame louvre triple room perfect 3 adults excellently clean large bathroom tv coffee making facilities also included additional pillows 3 bathroom robes us use staff always polite would help anything required would highly recommend hotel anyone wanting see sights paris

Reviews.Title: “Would never stay again”
Reviews.Author: taneveninwinter
Reviews.Content: rooms small simple clean highlight think breakfast buffet fantastic set nice tone day locations extremely convenient

Reviews.Title: “quaint lovely hotel”
Reviews.Author: sweetknees
Reviews.Content: first trip paris staff outstanding concierges desk woman name couldnt helpful recommendations excellent always professional customer service world class youre fortunate staff housekeeping services exceptional also impressed breakfast serviced morning large variety dishes would guest overall stay outstanding

Reviews.Title: “Great central location”
Reviews.Author: muchtraveled
Reviews.Content: first trip stayed 4 nights prefer duminy vendome great located near metro close louvre gardens around hotel many restaurant near shopping street traffic noise nice staff best breakfast bed comfortable clean small elevator wifi free standard room enough couple come 2 people suggest reservation bigger room better near hotel restaurant open sunday great price everything good come paris duminy vendome good choice small nice hotel

Reviews.Title: “Perfect combination - price & location!”
Reviews.Author: DeeEmmTee
Reviews.Content: husband hotel vacation three daughter chosen room facing back building since informed pub possible noise room quite confortable size good bathroom also great size beauty breakfast outstanding european standards besides restaurant charming near subway station block away walking distance main attractions louvre museum jardin place de la concorde rue st great shops also block away great parking found rue des even book spot via web highly recommended decided official hotel paris

Reviews.Title: “No Need to stay anywhere else!”
Reviews.Author: RedSoxFaninNYC
Reviews.Content: small hotel quiet walking distance major attractions 510 minutes large comfortable rooms

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location, Great Value!”
Reviews.Author: Geekyblonde
Reviews.Content: first trip duminy vendome fantastic well located 1 minute walk metro stop quiet street traffic noise yet one block youre rue de rivoli stayed 2 nights tour back 6 nights first one tight two staff absolutely wonderful accepted request anything bit bigger price range 6 night stay put us fantastic perfect thanks clean pleasant well run hotel staff front desk made everything run personal attention unexpected plus irish pub right next fun stop long day walking around friendly folks want go back paris stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, great location.”
Reviews.Author: MikeVA
Reviews.Content: travelled elderly mother first trip paris hotel wonderful location allowing us visit sites eg louvre away use buses return hotel rest room quite small twin beds couldnt separated managed might issue travelling friend rather partner close breakfasts plentiful staff friendly helpful bit noisy friday night irish pub next door wasnt bad quite expensive great worth

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location!!!”
Reviews.Author: janinepairserv
Reviews.Content: wife stayed 2 nights hotel close tuileries metro lunch tuileries gardens checked greeted friendly staff found room fourth floor clean much larger reviews left expecting rue de quiet road experience excessive noise adjacent irish pub minibar large enough store snacks bought unlike also kept quite cool bathroom large clean supplied adequate towels toiletries however little dated well maintained free wifi asked receptionist dinner recommendation sunday night despite advice st nearby rue st closed instead ate les rue des champs great meal really buzzing atmosphere ate st monday night equally good meal albeit homely french setting breakfast hotel served basement breakfast room despite lack natural light welcoming pleasant environment providing good quality food drink scrambled eggs sausages hot choices stay reception staff helpful arranging taxi station end stay despite general strike summary clean well presented small hotel great central quiet location friendly helpful staff

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and good service”
Reviews.Author: mrboo2
Reviews.Content: accommodating clean part quiet breakfast served charming area tastefully decorated choices food would please anyone location extremely convenient metro louvre gardens place vendome paris tours one could head door direction beautiful walk street le across street great chinese restaurant reasonable prices good food real bonus irish pub next door incredible piano

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel in great location”
Reviews.Author: Jaxes
Reviews.Content: friends stayed hotel 1 year ago recommended mainly due great location planning trip year initially rates quite high around different hotel thanks trip advisor booked hotel via internet problems whatsoever price happy opposed price travel agent could secure location fantastic irish pub right next door close popular sights metro station nearby case want travel afield staff courteous times breakfast good fully aware hotel rooms paris small side disappointed walked room enough space put 2 large suitcases bathroom quite large considering small bedroom whilst could hear noises adjoining room bother us one 3 star hotel good would hesitate recommend hotel anyone wanting clean safe hotel stay stayed 9 nights perhaps shop around best price get hotel

Reviews.Title: “Enjoyed staying at Duminy Vendome!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: hotel well located central main attractions without main road room spacious breakfast adequate wait staff attentive staff friendly spoke good english although one female staff member rude us upon arrival beware dark one wearing glasses hotel website rooms soundproof really case could hear talking tv sounds quite clearly room next us well doors slamming elevator doors closing laundry located outside room luckily neighbours didnt come late night supermarket around corner plenty cafes within walking distance wifi expensive 8 euro hour hotels providing free internet access days

Reviews.Title: “Positively Lacking!”
Reviews.Author: 007travelgal
Reviews.Content: arrived london via eurostar find one taxi driver willing take family four hotel tour de france last day sunday afternoon arrival option try find way using metro system two hours maze everything marked exit exit found taxi willing take two us hotel leaving teenage boys corner got within two blocks hotel walked rest way lots luggage hand found hotel staff helpful find sons together looked around starting enjoying paris little rooms fine clean worn dining area downstairs notch modern interior food good plenty everyone hotel like slow lifts found hotel nice pleasing didnt know great value booked american express didnt care much seemed fair location great loved close proximity louvre wed stay family

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel”
Reviews.Author: xaves99
Reviews.Content: hotel one best 3 star hotels weve stayed clean modern brilliant location hotel lifts size shoe boxes extremely slow thats probably fault hotel terms hotel staff make sure ask written letter breakfast included told included wasnt heated conversations manager received breakfast complimentary due mistake also happened another family saw issue location everything within couple minutes walk metro 50 meters around corner take anywhere need get including gare du eurostar terminal airports note though find single train station luggage friendly loads stairs prepared carry luggage stairs gardens du 1 block away great place take 4 year old son every day run around make sure try heading park die gardens lead action opposite end gardens road becomes champs elysee ends arc du triumph within walking distance best place shop galleries 3 entire blocks worth shops 23 block walk hotel walked eiffel tower many times stay long walk though 25 mins opt catch metro around corner hotel instead takes right eiffel tower 3 stops also took metro de versailles easy get tip early gets absolutely packed people waited 1 hour get ticket get summary hotel located quiet street next posh expensive hotels within walking distance anywhere want get hotel comfortable tastefully decorated aside tiny lifts incident breakfast tasted delicious way would recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location -- Good place for first trip to Paris”
Reviews.Author: msp132
Reviews.Content: hotel clean comfortable rooms well equipped service good friendly staff happy speak english first tried put us ground floor room set foot inside door heard constant hopefully water coming behind wall moved us far better room second floor breakfast quite good buffet served chic basement quite strange though playing american rock sound system bit took personal choice funny first got bit annoying fourth track however intend staying next time paris

Reviews.Title: “A great hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Hilltowngal
Reviews.Content: went duminy vendome valentines day night booked lunch tower coach tour river cruise end rue stones throw hotel location excellent literally 10 minutes walk mcdonalds en route le big subway end road lots shopping available room ground floor noisy pedestrian traffic street particularly irish bar next door plumbing sleep nice breakfast staff happy speak english without hesitation

Reviews.Title: “Great location/clean rooms”
Reviews.Author: allesvoorjouw
Reviews.Content: great hotel best part city everything within walking distance staff went beyond make sure week memorable one breakfast served every morning fresh many choices chose would recommend anyone wanted best location best price

Reviews.Title: “Paris in the fall...ooh la la”
Reviews.Author: JulieNitz
Reviews.Content: good small hotel friendly helpful staff breakfasts excellent basement rooms stayed little clean well appointed lifts floors small take long time arrive used staircase lot restaurant problem location central plenty choose recommended

Reviews.Title: “Give it a miss”
Reviews.Author: Travellerholic
Reviews.Content: great little hotel stayed 4 nights quiet street little way great shopping gardens major attractions hotel comfortable large room decent sized bathroom breakfast included room rate good value short walk gardens metro
